Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~Lin-YiTang can you please provide a bit more detail on your issue? Can you provide gists of your e2e configuration and highlight any changes you made to the default configuration? Thanks!

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: This is not a bug - it's a possible documentation issue in terms of understanding how hostnames work end to end in the system (especially when using compose)

Action.author: joe-alewine
Action.body: So old it's hard to imagine this is relevant anymore.
